DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to learn how different lifestyle factors, such as cigarette smoking and body weight, change after a diagnosis of bladder cancer, and how they influence who gets a bladder cancer recurrence and who does not.
DOC.brief_title: Determinants of Bladder Cancer Recurrence Study (The DETER Study)
DOC.criteria: Patients â‰¥18 years old AND Histologicallyconfirmed nonmuscle invasive bladder cancer (NMIBC) Patients are ineligible for the study if they have/had: Histologicallyconfirmed NMIBC diagnosed >36 months prior to enrollment Any condition, which in the opinion of the primary MSK clinician or investigators precludes their ability to provide informed consent or comply with study procedures Non Englishspeaking
